caption.p: Analysis of the anti-influenza A virus (IAV) activity of oseltamivir and itraconazole. Polarized Calu-3 monolayers were infected with 0.1 MOI of ( a, b) IAV H1N1pdm09 (pdm09) or ( c, d) A/Panama/2007/99 (Panama) for 24 h. At 2 h p.i. cells were treated with oseltamivir ( a, c) or itraconazole ( b, d) at the indicated concentrations for 16 h. Data represent mean percentages of viral titers Â± SEM, with mean virus titer in control cells (treated with the solvent DMSO) set to 100%; n = 3. LogIC 50 values were determined by fitting a non-linear regression model.
